tool_description: Validates directory and file paths for existence, accessibility, and correctness before performing search operations.

paths.description: Array of file or directory paths to validate

check_permissions.description: Whether to check read permissions on paths

error_messages: Empty path list: Provide at least one path to validate.
Invalid path format: One or more paths contain invalid characters or format.
Path length exceeded: One or more paths exceed maximum system length.
usage: Provide an array of paths to validate. Optionally enable permission checking. Returns validation status for each path and overall summary.

valid_paths.description: Array of paths that exist and are accessible

invalid_paths.description: Array of paths that do not exist or are inaccessible
